comment: She is a great instructor. She teaches mainly by powerpoint and lectures info from that and the book and from her own knowledge. Beware skipping class though, there are some EASY pop-quizzes. She has to get you. She is really interested in class verbal participation in giving opinions, etc, and is interested in contemporary examples.

I was concerned about this class since I read previous negative comments. Required for my major.Show up,complete written assignments(there are many)you will do well. I hated that our major paper was due the last week of the semester & was 30% of our grade.Students basically teach each other/not many lecture notes.She left f/ Ga Tech in Fall

Professor Singh is not the right fit for this subject area. It is not in your best interest to take her. She is borderline rude,very boring and unorganized. She is unaware of the basic principals of educating students, DO NOT TAKE HER!

She not that bad of a professor. I took her for another class the previous semester and I must say she has gotten much better! If you go to class and do the assignments you will pass and do great!The paper aren't that bad,just about all the grades come from writing assignment, no test!Don't get scared b/c of ppl comments TAKE HER u will pass!!!!!

Effective teacher for upper level courses, she doesn't care to teach freshmen and sophomore classes.No tests or quizzes for 4000 classes, only essays and papers.Be prepared to turn in at least 15-18 written assignments.Class consists soley of essays and class discussions on essays.Kind of boring, but interesting course content and material.

She is extremely well versed in biomedical ethics and practices, do not take for lower level courses.Classes are a little boring because all discussions are based on things that have already been written about in critiques.  All 4000 classes write a minimum of 10 essays and 5 research papers, but she's a fair grader.Only complaint too many papers!

Tests are ridiculous.  Only reason I made a C was because of the article analysis's.  She gives a study guide but makes tests after she already posted The study guide so it is not helpful at all.  If you ask a question that she thinks is obvious she will be rude and look at you as though you are stupid. Most boring class ever, avoid at all costs!

This professor was very hard. Test were ridiculous and worded really weird. I never made higher than a c on anything i did in this class even the papers that usually i make a's on. She does not clearly state how anything needs to be done. She should not be a teacher, because she has no idea how to direct her students nor teach them properly.

Worst Teacher EVER!!!!!! Her class was miserable. she does not care about her students and sll she does is lecture from the book in a monotone voice with a tone that says i do not care. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS for your own good.

Worst teacher ever. Her tests are ridiculously hard. She always reads off her notes, which shows she has no idea what she is talking about. She can't answer any questions and she never e-mailed me back about anything. Offers alot of extra credit opportunities. Trust me, you're gonna need it in this class. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!
She is a new professor and is horrible, she is very boring, and very unorganized when it comes down to the tests. If you want an easy A for this bull s^#$ class don't take it!
If you're actually interested in learning something you're better off taking someone else.. She's lost, in every sense of the word. Not helpful at all. Seriously, you have been warned.

She's not very knowledgeable in the field, her expertise lies more in biology and medicine. I enjoy sociology but didn't get anything special out of this class. I've had sociology classes before and I did question the accuracy of what she was telling us. The material seemed rushed through. It's not a slack class, but it's not really hard either.

DON'T TAKE THIS COURSE. It's not that its the most difficult course its that the professor is boring, uninformative and simply a waste of time. She's a nice lady but not fit for teaching this level of class. She  expected far too much for a lower level course. Plus she speaks just verbatim from the textbook so nobody read.

i took this class because I thought it was going to be interesting, but it turns out it is anything but interesting. If you're interested in sociology don't take her. But if you're just taking it for gen ed it will be pretty easy. I never listen in class and the tests aren't bad but she grades really picky on the article analysis.

Don't take this class! If you do: for the news articles (worth 15% of your grade each) she will tell you it needs to be 2 pages long...this is a LIE! Anything less than 4 pages will not earn you an "A." It's ok if it goes in circles and says the same thing over and over again, she needs the reiteration and length apparently.

Extremely scattered teacher who admits she only got into college because she is a minority woman, not because of grades. Boring class, with questionable content that makes broad generalizations about people that are just not true: i.e. "Muslims are polygamists." If the info isn't on her PP, don't even ask a question, she won't know the answer.
If you are taking her class you have to READ THE BOOK and STUDY, don't expect to learn from her pp. The class is challenging. so far I have had an A in every test. Attendance is mandatory

She is the worst teacher I have ever had. Reads straight from her power points and doesn't know the information very well. Has a hard time answering questions asked in class. attendance is mandatory. I study and know the information, and still fail the tests because of her wording. She clearly shouldn't be teaching, so I suggest not taking her.

Do NOT take this professor. I have never been so bored in any class I've ever taken. She reads directly from her PPTs. Her tests are unbelievably hard and worded ridiculously. She told the class one time to go to her office after class for an extra credit opportunity, so I did. When I got there, she told me she had already given it away in class.

HORRIBLE TEACHER. She does not know what she is talking about, and can't answer half of the questions she is asked. She prints out notes and reads straight from them to the class, which makes it extremely boring. Her tests are worded awful. I studied hard, yet still failed the tests because of her awful wording.

it's a very boring class. she's not very engaging. her questions/topics are so boring. her test questions pretty much test whether you were paying attention or not. i go to class only because she takes attendance.what she teaches is like out of my learning zone.if you ask for help she'll answer your question.i can't wait until the semester is done

Silly teacher who is not very creative or smart, misused "ethnics" when she meant "ethics" and never realized the difference. Reads verbatim from her PPT slides that she prints out for herself because she can't remember her own subject without them. Posts them online, no point in attending the class, except that (of course) she takes attendance.
